content:
I just got this error message trying to run ./x.py build --stage 3

Copying stage1 rustc from stage1 (x86_64-apple-darwin -> x86_64-apple-darwin / x86_64-apple-darwin)
Assembling stage2 compiler (x86_64-apple-darwin)
Uplifting stage1 std (x86_64-apple-darwin -> x86_64-apple-darwin)
Copying stage2 std from stage1 (x86_64-apple-darwin -> x86_64-apple-darwin / x86_64-apple-darwin)
Uplifting stage1 rustc (x86_64-apple-darwin -> x86_64-apple-darwin)
Copying stage2 rustc from stage1 (x86_64-apple-darwin -> x86_64-apple-darwin / x86_64-apple-darwin)
Assembling stage3 compiler (x86_64-apple-darwin)
thread 'main' panicked at 'fs::read(stamp) failed with No such file or directory (os error 2) ("/Users/dwh/src/github.com/rust-lang/rust/build/x86_64-apple-darwin/stage2-rustc/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/.librustc.stamp")', src/bootstrap/lib.rs:1296:24

I've tried cleaning and re-building, still no joy... Any ideas?
Is there a particular reason you are doing a stage 3 build? I suspect almost nobody does that, so it's not too surprising that it is broken.
I think I can make do with stage 2, actually :) Oh well, I'll leave this be!
Tôi không hiểu và không biết tiếng
Google translated from Vietnamese: I don't understand and don't know the language

@Phạm quang trung This is an english only "forum". If you don't understand english, you may want to use translate.google.com or look for an vietnamese rust community elsewhere. (translated using google translate)

@Phạm quang trung Đây là một "diễn đàn" chỉ tiếng anh. Nếu bạn không hiểu tiếng Anh, bạn có thể sử dụng translate.google.com hoặc tìm kiếm một cộng đồng gỉ tiếng Việt ở những nơi khác. (dịch bằng google dịch)
unrelated, but google translates their name as the same letters but with diacritics removed :face_palm: image.png
